caveats: The population and PiN projections published are for planning/programmatic purposes.
dataset_source: Inter-Agency Coordination Platform for Refugees and Migrants from Venezuela
name: rmrp-2024-update
notes:
Full dataset of the RMRP 2024 Update, including activities, partners, population projections, people in need, and target estimates disaggregated by age and gender, population type at Admin 1 level. 
More info on the R4V website: https://www.r4v.info/en/data

organization.name: r4v
organization.title: Inter-Agency Coordination Platform for Refugees and Migrants from Venezuela
organization.description:
In April 2018 the UN Secretary-General provided direction for IOM and UNHCR to lead and coordinate the regional response to the situation of refugees and migrants from Venezuela seeking access to basic rights and services, protection, as well as self-reliance and socio-economic integration. Further to this direction, the Regional Inter-Agency Coordination Platform was established as a forum to coordinate the response efforts across 17 countries of Latin America and the Caribbean, with a particular focus on achieving coherency and consistency throughout the response.

At national and sub-regional levels, the Regional Platform is complemented by local coordination mechanisms. Dedicated National and Sub-regional Platforms, collaborating closely with host governments are charged with the operational coordination and implementation of the regional Refugee and Migrant Response Plan (RMRP). Such coordination platforms are in place in Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador and Peru - at national levels - and in the Caribbean, Central America & Mexico and Southern Cone - at sub-regional levels. Their configuration is based on each situational context and the operational capacities of governments and RMRP partners, taking into account existing coordination structures.

solr_additions: {"countries": ["Argentina", "Aruba", "Bolivia (Plurinational State of)", "Brazil", "Chile", "Colombia", "Costa Rica", "Cura\u00e7ao", "Dominican Republic", "Ecuador", "Guyana", "Mexico", "Panama", "Paraguay", "Peru", "Trinidad and Tobago", "Uruguay"]}
title: Latin America and the Caribbean - Regional Refugee and Migrant Response Plan 2024

resources.description:
This dataset includes data on:
 
Projections: Estimation of the total number of individuals for each population type category until December 2024. There is no disaggregation at admin1  level for people In Transit as it is a flow of persons transiting through a country and by definition, do not stay in a single province/department/estate/region.
 
PiN: PiN include those whose wellbeing and dignified living standards are threatened or disrupted, and who cannot re-establish minimal and dignified living conditions without additional assistance. More specifically, people in need are those who suffer the consequences of a given crisis, natural or man-made, identified during the joint inter-sectoral analysis.
 
Target: Estimation of the number of persons who will be targeted by the activities implemented. for the target, the category In Transit represents both Venezuelan and persons of other nationalities.

resources.name: Population projections PiN and Target 2024

resources.description:
RMRP 2024 activities are submitted by the appealing organizations and then validated by National and/or Regional Sectors. The present database contains only the validated activities, that have then been used to calculate the final budget and target values for the RMRP 2024 Update.
 
As every paltform uses different aggregation models to calculate the target figures per sector, admin1 and national level, it is recommended to not sum beneficiaires across activities to estimate target.
 
For the official target, PiN and projections figures, please refer to the dataset available on: https://data.humdata.org/organization/r4v
